name: Red Cube (Francesco Gissara)
description:
Will you accept my challenge?

Here's a simple game.

You have to make it to the golden base, but there are some obstacles, so be careful!

Disclamer:

Note that the game it's still a demo, so I'd be happy to receive some advice from you :).

Anyway, have fun playing the game!

Francecso Gissara.

Musics by Patrick De Arteaga
